Fitz: an fMRI Analysis Ecosystem¶

Fitz expands on Lyman to provide a true ecosystem; instead of wrapping a single and static processing stream, Fitz provides many of the wrappings that lyman created in a way that allows people to spend their time running reproducible pipelines instead of messing around with grabbing data.
